summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Calibration Services module. All 22 backend API tests pass (100%). Frontend UI verified - List page with stats, search, status filter, and all form tabs (Contract Details, Customer Info, Service Provider, Meter List, Calibration Visits) working correctly. PDF generation functional.
seed_data_creation: Test contract created and deleted during testing. Existing contract b0752409-3f2a-4e96-9747-2524833603e8 used for read tests.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Calibration Services module fully functional. Test file at /app/tests/test_calibration_services.py covers: dashboard stats, list with pagination/filtering, CRUD operations, meter management, calibration visits, PDF generation, and error handling.

backend_tests.test_02_dashboard_stats_has_required_fie: PASS - All required fields present (total_contracts, active_contracts, expired_contracts, expiring_soon, total_meters)
backend_tests.test_04_list_contracts_has_pagination: PASS - Pagination fields present (contracts, total, skip, limit)
backend_tests.test_06_get_existing_contract: PASS - Get contract by ID returns correct data
backend_tests.test_08_contract_has_service_provider: PASS - service_provider has all 6 fields including nabl_cert_no
backend_tests.test_09_contract_has_contract_details: PASS - contract_details has all required fields
backend_tests.test_10_contract_has_meter_list: PASS - meter_list with all meter fields
backend_tests.test_11_create_contract: PASS - Create new contract with auto-generated contract_no
backend_tests.test_12_verify_created_contract: PASS - Created contract data persisted correctly
backend_tests.test_14_add_meter_to_contract: PASS - Add meter to contract works
backend_tests.test_16_download_pdf_report: PASS - PDF download returns valid PDF
backend_tests.test_17_pdf_is_valid_reportlab_pdf: PASS - PDF is valid ReportLab generated document
backend_tests.test_18_get_meter_types: PASS - Meter types endpoint returns all supported types

frontend_tests.sidebar_navigation: PASS - Calibration Services link visible in sidebar under Projects Dept

calibration_list_page.stats_cards: PASS - Total Contracts, Active, Expiring Soon, Expired, Total Meters visible

calibration_form_page.contract_details_tab: PASS - Project select, Start/End Date, Frequency, Status, Scope of Work, Special Conditions
calibration_form_page.customer_info_tab: PASS - Customer Name, Site Location, Contact Person, Contact Number, Email
calibration_form_page.service_provider_tab: PASS - Company Name, Address, Contact Person, Contact Number, Email, NABL Certificate No
calibration_form_page.meter_list_tab: PASS - Add Meter button, Meter Type, Make, Model, Serial No, Range, Accuracy Class, Location, Tag No
calibration_form_page.calibration_visits_tab: PASS - Add Visit button, Visit Date, Visit Type, Status, Technician, Remarks, Add Test Result

frontend_tests.edit_form: PASS - Edit form loads with existing data (dates, scope of work visible)

features_verified: Calibration Services list page loads correctly with stats
Create new calibration contract with all fields
Download PDF report for calibration contract
Navigation sidebar shows Calibration Services link
Status filter works on list page
